Service Details: - Offers drop-in centre providing a variety of social and recreational activities including exercise and dance programs, crafts, games and bingo- Operates a Seniors Bus so seniors can attend events and programs; call Marg 250.766.3227 or Marian 250.861.4131 for more info- Offers frozen meals for $5; please call Dorothy at 250.766.4568 to arrange - Offers Lake Country Seniors Buffet each Tuesday for $8
